media.headline: Garrett's first career strikeout
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Garrett fans Wong for first career strikeout
media.bigblurb: Amir Garrett gets Kolten Wong swinging for his first career strikeout in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Molina picks off Cozart at third
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Molina fires to third to pick off Cozart
media.bigblurb: Yadier Molina shows off his strong arm as he picks off Zack Cozart straying too far off third base in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Votto's RBI double
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Votto lines RBI double to right field
media.bigblurb: Joey Votto laces an RBI double to the wall in right field to give the Reds a 1-0 lead in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Hamilton steals second
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Hamilton swipes second base in the 6th
media.bigblurb: Billy Hamilton speeds into second with a stolen base, beating a strong throw from Yadier Molina in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Molina gets Hamilton at first
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Molina gets speedy Hamilton on weak grounder
media.bigblurb: Yadier Molina makes another great play as he fields a soft grounder in front of home plate and gets the speedy Billy Hamilton at first

media.headline: Schebler's solo home run
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Schebler belts solo homer to left-center
media.bigblurb: Scott Schebler slugs an opposite-field solo home run over the wall in left-center field to give the Reds a 2-0 lead in the 9th inning

media.headline: Cozart steals second base
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Cozart swipes second base in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Zack Cozart swipes second base to move into scoring position in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Iglesias K's Adams in the 8th
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Iglesias fans Adams to end the 8th
media.bigblurb: Rasiel Iglesias strikes out Matt Adams to end the bottom of the 8th inning, maintaining the Reds' one-run lead

media.headline: Garrett on a win in his debut
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Garrett on earning a win in his debut
media.bigblurb: Amir Garrett discusses his approach during his six scoreless innings and earning a win in his Major League debut

media.headline: Iglesias K's Piscotty, seals win
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Iglesias fans Piscotty to earn save
media.bigblurb: Rasiel Iglesias whiffs Stephen Piscotty to earn a two-inning save and seal the Reds 2-0 win over the Cardinals

media.headline: Leake's strong performance
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Leake fans six in eight innings
media.bigblurb: Mike Leake pitches eight strong innings in his season debut, striking out six while allowing only one run on six hits and one walk

media.headline: Garrett's scoreless debut
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Garrett fans four in six scoreless in debut
media.bigblurb: Amir Garrett strikes out four in six scoreless innings in his Major League debut, allowing only two hits and two walks to earn the win

media.headline: Leake's first strikeout of 2017
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Leake fans Duvall for first strikeout of '17
media.bigblurb: Mike Leake gets Adam Duvall swinging for his first strikeout of the 2017 season in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Peralta's nice snag
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Peralta snags liner to rob Gennett
media.bigblurb: Jhonny Peralta makes a nice grab on a line drive to rob Scooter Gennett of a hit in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Molina nabs Votto at third
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Molina fires to third to nab Votto
media.bigblurb: Yadier Molina throws out another baserunner as Joey Votto is caught attempting to steal third base in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Barnhart nabs Piscotty at second
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Barnhart nabs Piscotty attempting to steal
media.bigblurb: Tucker Barnhart fires to second in time to get Stephen Piscotty attempting to steal in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Cardinals TV on Reyes
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Cardinals broadcast gives update on Reyes
media.bigblurb: The Cardinals broadcast gives an update on the injury status of top prospect Alex Reyes and how he was encouraged by Lance Lynn's start

media.headline: Statcast: Hamilton beats Molina
media.blurb: Statcast of the Day: Hamilton's wheels beat Molina
media.bigblurb: Statcast of the Day measures Billy Hamilton's primary and secondary leads as he steals second base despite Yadier Molina's 1.85 pop time

media.headline: Price on Garrett's debut, win
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Price discusses pitching in Reds' 2-0 win
media.bigblurb: Reds manager Bryan Price talks about Amir Garrett and the quality pitching and defense his team used to shut down the Cardinals in the win

media.headline: Matheny on hitting struggles
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Matheny discusses Cards' hitting struggles
media.bigblurb: Cardinals manager Mike Matheny discusses his team's hitting struggles following a 2-0 loss to the Reds

media.headline: 4/7/17 CG: CIN@STL
media.blurb: 4/7/17 Condensed Game: CIN@STL
media.bigblurb: 4/7/17 Condensed Game: CIN@STL

media.headline: Recap: CIN 2, STL 0
media.blurb: 4/7/17: Garrett earns win in debut, Schebler homers
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Amir Garrett tossed six scoreless innings in his Major League debut as Joey Votto and Scott Schebler powered the Reds' offense

media.headline: Hamilton on Reds' win
media.blurb: CIN@STL: Hamilton discusses Reds' 2-0 win
media.bigblurb: Billy Hamilton discusses the Reds' 2-0 win over the Cardinals
